title: Identify a movie font
content:
Hello everybody

which font do you think it is?  
Any idea will be appreciate.  
Thank you all!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131035315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/y-tu-mama-tambien-title-screenshot-small_6605.jpg)
author: cboche

comments.content:
It looks to me like a very condensed bold [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131035315/http:/www.linotype.com/53772/linotypeunivers510compressedmedium-font.html)

It feels more condensed than anything I can find, but the forms (especially the M, U, Y, and even the B, though the B is not quite right).

\_\_\_  
 [EM](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131035315/http:/www.evanmade.com/)
